name: The Craneslayer Chronicle
description:
For generations our people have lived under the repressive regime of Lord Crane, He Who Listens. But the discovery of an ancient relic, a diary written by his forgotten brother, has changed all that. You are our champion, our last hope. With the text as your guide, you must venture to the Seat of Power and put an end to his rule.

Short interactive fiction loosely inspired by a popular 90s sitcom.
